name: Mexican Jones Runner Road Trip
description:
Explore hot Mexica and run for your life! Arriva!

You are a Mexican cowboy, your name is Jones and you are really love running! You know, this is very good for your health, for example, you can lose extra weight (if you want). Every sport can be dangerous and harmful, and so does running. You are running in the open air, so you can fall into the abyss. Oooops.
Mexican Jones Runner Road Trip – enjoy open air and have fun!

HOW TO PLAY: Swipe to slide, jump and turn. Avoid obstacles and avoid falling. Run as long as you can. Good luck!

Mexican Jones Runner Road Trip GAME FEATURES:
- Simple, but addictive runner;
- Hot Mexican atmosphere;
- Train your reaction and attention;
- Run as long as you can – infinite game;
- Cool graphics and sounds.

Mexican Jones Runner Road Trip – are you ready to start? Drink a shot of tequila (if you are old enough, of course), eat a piece of cactus and run, run and run!
